unnormalised: Hey Quorans! Let's talk Ayurveda treatments! So, I’ve been exploring Ayurveda more lately, and I wanted to share some thoughts and see what experiences you all have had.
normalised: Hey Quorans! Let's talk Ayurveda treatments! So, I’ve been exploring Ayurveda more lately, and I wanted to share some thoughts and see what experiences you all have had.

unnormalised: Ever felt completely drained, despite sleeping 8 hours? Well, that was me last month. Turns out my doshas were way out of whack! After some research and recommendations, I finally went for an Abhyanga massage at a reputable Ayurvedic clinic in Kerala. Total bliss! It's an oil massage - a warm medicated oil is applied to the whole body. Afterwards, I felt so relaxed and grounded, like I'd hit a reset button.

unnormalised: They diagnosed my *Prakriti* (basic constitution) based on a detailed consultation – pretty interesting stuff. It explained a lot! Now, I'm also trying to incorporate more Ayurvedic principles into my daily life, like eating according to my dosha type and waking up before 06:00 hrs. I am also planning to attend an introductory lecture on Ayurveda on 20/10/2024 at Patanjali Yogpeeth, Haridwar.
